gui.soundboard.config.title: Soundboard Config
gui.soundboard.config.categories.general:
Open the sounds folder from the button below and drop in your .mp3 files.
Each file becomes a sound entry where you can set its own amplifier and choose whether it should loop.
You can also assign a custom key combo (any number of keys) to each sound.
Press the key combo in-game to start the sound; pressing it again stops that sound.
gui.soundboard.config.state.global.play_: Other player can only hear the sound not your microphone.
gui.soundboard.config.state.global.show_: Show all currently playing sound in game Hud
